fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain more power the more you sleep:
1st sleep: Your ability now heals your target
2nd sleep: Your ability now removes negative effects from your target
3rd sleep: Your target gains roleblock and control immunity for the night
4th sleep: When you successfully save a player from an attack, gain a powerful autovest. Does not stack
5th sleep: You will deal a basic attack to visitors who do not win with your target
6th sleep: Your target will secretly be unable to be hung the following day. Any votes cast for your target are instead treated as though that player had voted for themself.
- You cannot gain roleblock immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the winning team have at least half of their members be alive by the end of the game
